channel.title: The Tavern’s Blog
channel.description: My findings and sharings on programming projects, personal or not.

item.title: I tried cross-compiling for the Raspberry Pi
item.description: I tried cross-compiling for the Raspberry Pi. And it went horribly wrong.

item.title: Arduino Internals — What's behind the magic?
item.description: The Arduino ecosystem changed the world of DIY electronics, let's take a look under the hood to figure out how that happened.

item.title: Git is your friend, not your enemy — Part 3
item.description: Git is a helpful tool when it's actually part of your workflow instead of fighting against it. Learn how to use Git to make it this way!

item.title: Git is your friend, not your enemy — Part 2
item.description: Git is a helpful tool when it's actually part of your workflow instead of fighting against it. Learn how to use Git to make it this way!

item.title: Git is your friend, not your enemy — Part 1
item.description: Git is a helpful tool when it's actually part of your workflow instead of fighting against it. Learn how to use Git to make it this way!
